existing_features.title: In the InvestmentForm component, add an e-project dropdown field positioned immediately after the 'Description' field. Populate this dropdown with all secoinfi-apps options that are currently defined in the backend (the 38 options from the e-project list). The dropdown should be required and visible to all users, not just admins.

Add a 'Mode' select dropdown in the InvestmentForm component after the e-project dropdown. This dropdown must contain exactly four options: 'GPay', 'Crypto', 'CBDC', and 'Wallets'. The field should be required and visible to all users.

Add two transaction ID input fields in the InvestmentForm component after the Mode dropdown: (1) 'Txn ID (Nat)' as a required numeric input field accepting only natural numbers, and (2) 'Txn ID (String)' as an optional text input field. Both fields should be visible to all users.

Add a payment notice section in the InvestmentForm component after the transaction ID fields. Display the following information: UPI ID 'secoin@uboi', WhatsApp contact link 'https://wa.me/919620058644', and Ethereum address '0x4a100E184ac1f17491Fbbcf549CeBfB676694eF7'. Format this as an informational notice box visible to all users.

new_feature_requests.summary: Add e-project dropdown to create investment form with secoinfi-apps options
Add payment mode selector (GPay, Crypto, CBDC, Wallets) to investment form
Add transaction ID fields (Nat and optional string) to investment form
Display payment notice with UPI, WhatsApp, and Ethereum address in investment form
Make investment form visible to all users without admin modification requirement

Ensure the expanded InvestmentForm with all new fields (e-project dropdown, Mode select, transaction ID fields, and payment notice) is visible and accessible to all authenticated users in the Dashboard component, not just admins. Remove any admin-only restrictions on form visibility while maintaining the form's position in the existing Dashboard layout.

Update the backend main.mo createInvestment function to accept and store the new fields from the expanded form: e-project selection (text), mode (text), transaction ID as Nat (numeric), and optional transaction ID as string. Ensure the Investment type includes these new fields.

projectName: Expand Create Investment Form with E-Project, Payment Mode, Transaction IDs, and Payment Notice
